body: Hi, You would have to do exactly what you have in your screenshot and then add to energy plus library. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/f-5dhOEsZkuOdYqfQ5ATyfQ9UezBiZQ3I-ibZvIi-JxtZ*-konzG6*pBJSAVBaULb2Hy2VCp*bM9mJYxteMYxeMQuF*3eWHG/material.PNG) You will have to input all the data of the material. I guess your best chance is looking in the web pages of companies that create recycled or sustainable insulations, as there are some done out of cotton, wool or other fabrics. Julia
